In case of an emergency on the road, the ego-car should stop in the lane and try not to change lanes in an emergency. If the braking distance is not enough, collision avoidance can be taken. Ego-car should turn on the turn signal and observe the rear vehicles, and change lanes quickly.//ego-car hits a curb

They should always look at the rearview mirror and pay attention to the distance to the rear vehicles. For rear vehicles, when the braking light of the front vehicle lights up, they should brake synchronously, slow down, and keep a safe distance to the front vehicle.//ego-car hits a car

If the braking distance is not enough, the truck can take emergency avoidance measures, turn on the turn signal and change lanes quickly to avoid after observing the rear-vehicles.//truck hits truck

11//008209 20 50 77，ego-car does not hit a car//Ego-car is rear ended by the rear car//Ego-cars should try to avoid changing lanes at will, so as not to affect the normal traffic of the rear vehicles. They should always look at the rearview mirror and pay attention to the distance to the rear vehicles. For rear vehicles, when the braking light of the front vehicle lights up, they should brake synchronously, slow down, and keep a safe distance to the front vehicle.//ego-car hits a car

Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.//car hits motorbike

Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.//car hits car

Ego-car should turn on the turn signal and observe the rear vehicles, and change lanes quickly.//ego-car hits a curb

For rear vehicles, when the braking light of the front vehicle lights up, they should brake synchronously, slow down, and keep a safe distance to the front vehicle.//ego-car hits a car

During driving, the goods must also be observed at any time. If there is looseness, inclination and other conditions, they should be timely re wrapped and bundled; During driving, the self-propelled vehicle should keep a certain safe distance from other vehicles, especially for the large trucks carrying goods, and should not follow or parallel with them for a long time.//ego-car hits small roadblocks road pothholes

If the braking distance is not enough, the truck can take emergency avoidance measures, turn on the turn signal and change lanes quickly to avoid after observing the rear-vehicles.//ego-car hits a truck

Ego-car should turn on the turn signal and observe the rear vehicles, and change lanes quickly.//ego-car is out of control
